title: Honor 3 Still?
body: I got honor level 3 before all of my friends and yet they are both honor 5 while i play the same amount of games as them and im honor 3. Ive been honor 3 for over a month even with frequent honors from other non premades is this a bug or something?

replies.body:
Ranking up in honor has a few different caveats to remember. Simply playing games gets you a small amount of honor, as well as actually BEING honored. If everyone honors someone on your team, you also get another small boost as well. 

Playing more games is a good way to bump up your honor, so your friends might just be playing more often. There's also the chance that they're getting honored more often by their team. Everyone is going to rank up at different paces, you shouldn't be comparing your progress with others.
